<a id="SkeletonModificationStack2D"></a>

# SkeletonModificationStack2D

**Experimental:** This class may be changed or removed in future versions.

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A resource that holds a stack of [SkeletonModification2D](SkeletonModification2D.md)\\ s.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This resource is used by the Skeleton and holds a stack of [SkeletonModification2D](SkeletonModification2D.md)\\ s.

This controls the order of the modifications and how they are applied. Modification order is especially important for full-body IK setups, as you need to execute the modifications in the correct order to get the desired results. For example, you want to execute a modification on the spine *before* the arms on a humanoid skeleton.

This resource also controls how strongly all of the modifications are applied to the [Skeleton2D](Skeleton2D.md).

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="SkeletonModificationStack2D_property_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **enabled** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModificationStack2D_property_enabled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_enabled**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_enabled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the modification's in the stack will be called. This is handled automatically through the [Skeleton2D](Skeleton2D.md) node.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModificationStack2D_property_modification_count"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **modification_count** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModificationStack2D_property_modification_count)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_modification_count**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_modification_count**\ (\ )

The number of modifications in the stack.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModificationStack2D_property_strength"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **strength** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModificationStack2D_property_strength)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_strength**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_strength**\ (\ )

The interpolation strength of the modifications in stack. A value of ``0`` will make it where the modifications are not applied, a strength of ``0.5`` will be half applied, and a strength of ``1`` will allow the modifications to be fully applied and override the [Skeleton2D](Skeleton2D.md) [Bone2D](Bone2D.md) poses.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="SkeletonModificationStack2D_method_add_modification"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_modification**\ (\ modification\: [SkeletonModification2D](SkeletonModification2D.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModificationStack2D_method_add_modification)

Adds the passed-in [SkeletonModification2D](SkeletonModification2D.md) to the stack.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModificationStack2D_method_delete_modification"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **delete_modification**\ (\ mod_idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModificationStack2D_method_delete_modification)

Deletes the [SkeletonModification2D](SkeletonModification2D.md) at the index position `mod_idx`, if it exists.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModificationStack2D_method_enable_all_modifications"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **enable_all_modifications**\ (\ enabled\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModificationStack2D_method_enable_all_modifications)

Enables all [SkeletonModification2D](SkeletonModification2D.md)\\ s in the stack.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModificationStack2D_method_execute"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **execute**\ (\ delta\: [float](float.md), execution_mode\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModificationStack2D_method_execute)

Executes all of the [SkeletonModification2D](SkeletonModification2D.md)\\ s in the stack that use the same execution mode as the passed-in `execution_mode`, starting from index ``0`` to [modification_count](SkeletonModificationStack2D.md#SkeletonModificationStack2D_property_modification_count).

\ **Note:** The order of the modifications can matter depending on the modifications. For example, modifications on a spine should operate before modifications on the arms in order to get proper results.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModificationStack2D_method_get_is_setup"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **get_is_setup**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModificationStack2D_method_get_is_setup)

Returns a boolean that indicates whether the modification stack is setup and can execute.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModificationStack2D_method_get_modification"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[SkeletonModification2D](SkeletonModification2D.md) **get_modification**\ (\ mod_idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModificationStack2D_method_get_modification)

Returns the [SkeletonModification2D](SkeletonModification2D.md) at the passed-in index, `mod_idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModificationStack2D_method_get_skeleton"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Skeleton2D](Skeleton2D.md) **get_skeleton**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModificationStack2D_method_get_skeleton)

Returns the [Skeleton2D](Skeleton2D.md) node that the SkeletonModificationStack2D is bound to.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModificationStack2D_method_set_modification"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_modification**\ (\ mod_idx\: [int](int.md), modification\: [SkeletonModification2D](SkeletonModification2D.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModificationStack2D_method_set_modification)

Sets the modification at `mod_idx` to the passed-in modification, `modification`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModificationStack2D_method_setup"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **setup**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModificationStack2D_method_setup)

Sets up the modification stack so it can execute. This function should be called by [Skeleton2D](Skeleton2D.md) and shouldn't be manually called unless you know what you are doing.
